snippet: As part of an initiative to make military service more family friendly, Ashton B. Carter has created a pilot program that will pay for troops to have their reproductive cells preserved.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter presents plan to help United States service members freeze sperm and eggs as part of pilot program; aim is to reassure troops that they can still have children even if injured on battlefield and to encourage women to stay in service longer.
lead_paragraph: As part of an initiative to make military service more family friendly, Ashton B. Carter has created a pilot program that will pay for troops to have their reproductive cells preserved.

headline.main: Pentagon to Offer Plan to Store Eggs and Sperm to Retain Young Troops
headline.print_headline: Pentagon to Offer Plan to Store Eggs and Sperm to Retain Young Troops

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
